sentences.text: The '''G20 Johannesburg Summit''' will be the List of G20 summits|twentieth meeting of the G20|Group of Twenty (G20), a meeting of heads of state and government held from 22 to 23 November 2025. It will be the first G20 summit held in Johannesburg, South Africa and on the African continent. The summit will cost the South African government South African rand|R691 million.

sentences.text: There are high expectations that South Africa will lead a progressive, people-centred, development-oriented and solution-oriented presidency, in a fractured global geopolitical context, until it hands over the presidency to the United States on 1 December 2025.

sentences.text:
For the G20 to make a meaningful contribution in addressing the polycrisis confronting the world, South Africa has adopted the theme '''“Solidarity, Equality, Sustainability”'''.

This theme reflects South Africa’s intention to build on the efforts and successes of the last three G20 Presidencies of the Global North and Global South|Global South and to advance the development agenda.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |date=2024-12-05 |title=2025 G20 Summit {{!}} Johannesburg to host global event |website=eNCA |url=https://www.enca.com/videos/2025-g20-summit-johannesburg-host-global-event |access-date=2025-02-24 |language=en}}</ref>

sentences.text: South Africa will continue to use the G20 as a premier forum for economic and financial cooperation, bringing together developed and developing countries, and emerging markets to find solutions to global challenges. During the 2024 State of the Nation Address, President Cyril Ramaphosa stated that “we will put Africa’s development at the top of the agenda when we host the G20 in 2025.”

references.text: <ref name=":0" /><ref>{{Cite web |date=2025-02-03 |title=Saudi Sherpa Office holds first G20 workshop in preparation for 2025 summit |url=https://www.saudigazette.com.sa/article/649090/SAUDI-ARABIA/Saudi-Sherpa-Office-holds-first-G20-workshop-in-preparation-for-2025-summit-nbsp |access-date=2025-02-24 |website=Saudigazette |language=English}}</ref>

sentences.text: South Africa will use its G20 Presidency to advocate and mobilise support for developing economies in Africa and the Global South, building on the efforts and successes of the Indonesian, Indian and Brazilian Presidencies to champion the development agenda.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |last=Lebuso |first=Sthembiso |title=Ramaphosa sets bold agenda for South Africa's G20 presidency |url=https://www.news24.com/citypress/news/ramaphosa-sets-bold-agenda-for-south-africas-g20-presidency-20250121 |access-date=2025-02-24 |website=City Press |language=en-US}}</ref>

sentences.text:
South Africa’s G20 Presidency will drive the following high-level deliverables, and priorities, which will find expression in the work of the Sherpa and Finance Tracks:
* '''Priority 2''' – Food security
* '''Priority 3''' – Artificial intelligence and innovation for sustainable development

references.text:
<ref name=":0" />
* '''Priority 1''' – Inclusive economic growth, industrialisation, employment and reducing inequality<ref>{{Cite web |last=Opinion |title=G20 summit an opportunity to fix ailing Joburg metro |url=https://www.iol.co.za/news/politics/opinion/g20-summit-an-opportunity-to-fix-ailing-joburg-metro-6b30a1c4-4a68-4c69-a34d-0c221ee78e9b |access-date=2025-02-24 |website=iol.co.za |language=en}}</ref>
